name: the gobblin' goblin
description:
BASIC INFO

this is a bitsy game, meaning that it is a narrative game where you walk around to talk to characters and interact with objects. to get the full experience, i would suggest that you try interacting with everything and everyone that you see in this game. you can use the arrow keys, or the wasd keys to move around. this game was made for the bitsy goblin jam.

SUMMARY

in this game you play as gable gabloni, a food reviewing goblin who's headed to a new restaurant in order to try out some of the dishes there. will gabloni rejoice or retch at these dishes? there's only one way to find out.
